attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dear sir or madam,i have a great concern about the way people lend money,i had an email off provident loans,i or any one else whether we have finance problems can have a £500 loan over 55 wks at £9 week,that is £495 return at 177%apr.and i believe it is almost 66%interest.what a disgrace,can you not stop these people ripping the poor off and encourageing others for a loan.this in my opinion stealing.it must be stopped.b.palfrey

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
